HowToUse.title: How to use Generative Fill AI

steps.title: Step 1: Upload the Picture
steps.description: First, Upload the picture you wish to shape.

steps.title: Step 2: Enter a prompt
steps.description: Enter the description or keywords related to the image you want to create.

steps.title: Step 3: Generate the Image
steps.description: Click Generate and in seconds, you will get the result.
